description: AIXBT is an AI agent and crypto market intelligence platform that specializes in tracking market trends and interpreting data on the Base blockchain.
instructions: You can see the AIXBT terminal at aixbt.tech, or track it on the X account aixbt_agent.

social.description: Official Twitter account for AIXBT providing updates and insights.

uris.description: Dexscreener URL for AIXBT on the Base blockchain.
